thread.section_title: Coverage and breaking news of entertainment in Hollywood and Los Angeles
thread.title: Bruno Mars back among top artists streamed in the Los Angeles area
thread.title_full: Bruno Mars back among top artists streamed in the Los Angeles area

title: Bruno Mars back among top artists streamed in the Los Angeles area
text:
The popular Internet radio platform iHeartRadio, which has more than 700 million app downloads, gathers streaming music data in Los Angeles. Here are the top 10 artists and songs streaming in L.A. this week.
TOP 10 ARTISTS
1. The Weeknd
2. Drake
3. Fetty Wap
4. Taylor Swift
5. Bruno Mars
6. Ariana Grande
7. Justin Bieber
8. Selena Gomez
9. Meghan Trainor
10. Katy Perry
TOP 10 SONGS
1. “Hotline Bling” by Drake
2. “What Do You Mean?” by Justin Bieber
3. “Trap Queen” by Fetty Wap
4. “679” by Fetty Wap featuring Remy Boyz
5. “The Hills” by The Weeknd
6. “Wildest Dreams” by Taylor Swift
7. “Watch Me (Whip/Nae Nae)” by Silento
8. “Can’t Feel My Face” by The Weeknd
9. “Bad Blood” by Taylor Swift
10. “Stitches” by Shawn Mendes
Advertisement
